overview: The 'More Information' page of Digital Experience Healthcare provides search, filter, and sorting capabilities for healthcare services. It includes a sticky navigation bar, accessibility features, and dynamic service card rendering via JavaScript.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Service cards grid with skeleton loaders
interactions: Click theme toggle to switch dark/light mode
Type in search input to filter services
Click filter chips to refine displayed services
Select sort option to reorder service cards
data_flow: User input in search field triggers client-side filtering of service cards
Filter chip clicks apply category-based filtering
Sort dropdown changes sorting order of displayed services
Skeleton loaders replaced by fetched service data via JS
accessibility: ARIA labels for navigation and filter groups
Visually hidden labels for search input and help text
aria-hidden on decorative icons and skeleton loaders
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link focuses main content
Ensure theme toggle updates UI and persists state
Test search input filters service cards dynamically
Confirm filter chips apply correct category filters
Check sort dropdown reorders cards properly
Assert skeleton loaders replaced with service data
Validate accessibility attributes and keyboard navigation
Verify analytics events fire on key interactions
